# Gumroad Trigger node

[Gumroad](https://gumroad.com){:target=_blank .external-link} is an online platform that enables creators to sell products directly to consumers.

/// note | Credentials
You can find authentication information for this node [here](/integrations/builtin/credentials/gumroad.md).
///

///  note  | Examples and templates
For usage examples and templates to help you get started, refer to n8n's [Gumroad Trigger integrations](https://n8n.io/integrations/gumroad-trigger/){:target=_blank .external-link} page.
///

properties_schema.name: resource
properties_schema.description: The resource is gonna fire the event

options.name: Cancellation
options.description: When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of cancellations of the user's subscribers

options.name: Dispute
options.description: When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of the disputes raised against user's sales

options.name: Dispute Won
options.description: When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of the sale disputes won

options.name: Refund
options.description: When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of refunds to the user's sales

options.name: Sale
options.description: When subscribed to this resource, you will be notified of the user's sales
